en: Messages of congratulations continue to pour in for South African Netflix documentary, My Octopus Teacher, which has won the Oscar for Best Documentary Feature at the 93rd Academy Awards Ceremony in Los Angeles.

en: The documentary is a collaboration driven by the Sea Change Project, an NGO which raises awareness of the beauty and ecological importance of South Africa’s kelp forest.

en: It’s such a great platform for the work that were doing at the sea change project we’ve really focussed on the great African sea forest.
tsn: Ke tsela e ntle ya go bewa mo seraleng ka tiro e re e dirang kwa porojekeng ya “Sea Change”. Re tota re tsepamesitse megopolo mo sekgweng se segolo sa Aforika.
mt0: Re tlile go dira tiro e e ntsi mo tirong ya sea change project, re ne ra nna le tlhokomelo e kgolo mo lefatsheng la Afrika.

en: Our mission is to continue telling stories about this wonderful ecosystem so it can inspire and create awe in other people to want to protect nature, to want to relate to nature to want to immerse themselves in nature this is what we hope for people to remember that you are wild, that you are nature that this beautiful planet is your home that is really what we were trying to say in the film how wild places and wild animals are precious and that we all belong here, says Swati Thiyagarajan from the sea Change Project.
tsn: Maikaelelo a rona ke go tswelela go tlhaba ditlhamane ka ga tikologo e e monate gore e tle e kgone go rotloetsa le go gakgamatsa batho gore le bona ba batle go sireletsa tlhago, ba batle go amana le yona le go batla go nwelelela mo go yona. Se ke se re solofelang gore batho ba tlaa se gakologelwa. Ba gakologelwe gore ba tlhaga, gore o tlhago ka bowena, gore polanete e ntle e, ke legae la gago. Se ke sona tota se re neng re leka go se bua mo filiming, gore mafelo a a tlhaga le diphologolo tse di tlhaga di botlhokwa le gore rotlhe re bontlhabongwe jwa fano. Go bua Swati Thiyagarajan go tswa kwa porojekeng ya Sea Change.

en: In an earlier interview with SABC News, the star of the film Foster said the Octopus taught him that nature and human beings are woven from the same cloth and thread.
tsn: Mo dipolotsong le ba dikgang tsa SABC pejana fale, naledi ya filimi ya “Foster” o rile Octopus e mo rutile gore tlhago le batho di dirilwe go tswa mo leseleng le le lengwe fela.

en: And that each needs the other in order to survive on planet Earth.

en: The 2020 Netflix original by Pippa Ehrlich and James Reed documents a year spent by filmmaker Craig Foster forging a relationship with a wild, common octopus in a South African kelp forest in False Bay near Cape Town.

en: I know there are many South Africans who are awake in the middle of the night to watch this ceremony and in many ways, this really is a tiny personal story that played out in a sea forest at the very tip of Africa.
tsn: Ke a itse gore go na le Maaforikaborwa a mantsi a a sa robaleng mo gare ga bosigo go bogela moletlo o, mme ka ditsela di le dintsi, e ke e kgang e nnye ya sebele e e tlhageletseng kwa lewatleng le dikgwa kwa nkong ya Aforika.

en: Hollywood stars started arriving for the Academy Awards ceremony on Sunday on what could be a historic night packed with surprises, not just around the winners but the event itself.
tsn: Dinaledi tsa kwa Hollywood di simolotse go goroga ka nako ya moletlo wa dikgele tsa akatemi ka Sontaga, kwa go se e ka nnang motsi wa hisetori e e tletseng dikgagamatso , e seng fela go bafenyi mme le tiragalo ka boyone.

en: Sound of Metal first-time nominee Paul Raci was among the first to walk a scaled-down red carpet outside the Mission Revival-style Union Station in Los Angeles, which is being used for the first time because of the coronavirus pandemic.

en: We just want the whole thing, right out of the gate, to announce itself as being different, Steven Soderbergh, one of a trio of producers, said ahead of Sundays show.

mt0: Re batla fela go re sengwe le sengwe, ka ntle ga gate, se a nna se le sengwe, Steven Soderbergh, mongwe wa ba tlhahiso ba bararo, o ne a rialo pele ga seteishene sa Sontaga.

en: Hollywood’s drive for diversity over the past five years could lead to all four acting prizes, as well as the best director trophy, going to people of color for the first time in the 93-year history of the highest honors in the movie business.
tsn: Phisegelo ya Hollywood ya go bona mefuta e e farologaneng mo dingwageng tse tlhano tse di fetileng, e ka dira gore dikabelo tsotlhe di le nne, gammogo le sekgele sa mokaedi yo o gaisang, di ye kwa bathong ba mmala, la ntlha mo ngwageng wa bo 93, hisetori ya tlotlo e e kwa godimo mo kgwebong ya difilimi.
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know Hollywood's drive for diversity over the past five years could lead to all four acting prizes, as well as the best director trophy, going to people of color for the first time in the 93-year history of the highest honors in the movie business.

en: If Zhao, 39, wins best director, she will be only the second woman and the first Asian woman to clinch the Academy Award in that field.
tsn: Fa Zhao, 39, a ka gapa sekgele sa mokaedi yo o gaisang, e tlaa nna fela mosadi wa bobedi le mosadi wa moAsia wa ntlha go iponela sekgele sa akatemi mo karolong eo.
mt0: If Zhao, 39, wins best director, she will be only the second woman and the first Asian woman to clinch the Academy Award in that field.

en: The Trial of the Chicago 7, which is set against the backdrop of the Vietnam War protests, is seen as the strongest challenger to Nomadland for best picture, awards experts say.
tsn: Tsheko ya Chicago 7, e e kgatlhanong le maemo a Vietnam, e bonwa e le kgwetlho e e masisi go Nomadland, ka sekgele sa setshwantsho se se gaisitseng, go bua baitseanape.
mt0: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re

en: It is probably the most traditional Oscar movie.
tsn: E ka tswa e le yona filimi ya Oscar movie e e tlwaeleging thata.
mt0: Re: Go tlwaelegile go re ke filimi e e tlwaelehileng ya Oscar.

en: It’s got a lot of big colourful performances and historical relevance, said Alison Willmore, film critic at New York magazine.
tsn: E na le ditiragalo tse dikgolo tse di itumedisang le hisetori e e maleba, go bua Alison Willmore, motshwayadiphoso wa difilimi kwa makasineng wa New York.
mt0: Re: Go na le ditiro tse dintsi tse di ntle tse di tlwaelehileng le tse di tlwaelehileng tsa histori, a rialo Alison Willmore, mogopolo wa ditshwantsho mo New York Magazine.

en: The other best picture nominees are 1930s Hollywood drama Mank, which led with 10 nominations; revenge tale Promising Young Woman, Korean immigrant family story Minari, civil rights biopic Judas and the Black Messiah, dementia tale The Father and Sound of Metal about a deaf drummer.
tsn: Batlhophiwa ba bangwe ba setshwantsho se se gaisitseng ke terama ya kwa Hollywood ya 1930, Mank, e e itlhomileng kwa pele ka ditlhopho di le 10; filimi ya ipusulesetso, Promising Young Woman, filimi ya lelapa le le fudugileng go tswa kwa Korea, Minari, filimi ka ga ditshwanelo tsa baagi, Judas and the Black Messiah, filimi ka ga bolwetse jwa go lebala, The Father le Sound of Metal, filimi ka ga moletsameropa wa susu.

en: The race for lead actress is wide open, with Frances McDormand (Nomadland), Carey Mulligan (Promising Young Woman), Viola Davis (Ma Raineys Black Bottom), Vanessa Kirby (Pieces of a Woman) and Andra Day (The United States vs. Billie Holiday) competing for the prize.
tsn: Lebelo la modiragatsi wa mosadi yo o itlhomileng kwa pele le bulegile, go na le Frances McDormand (Nomadland), Carey Mulligan (Promising Young Woman), Viola Davis (Ma Raineys Black Bottom), Vanessa Kirby(Pieces of a Woman) le Andra Day (The United States vs. Billie Holiday)  ba ba gaisanelang sekgele se.
mt0: Go nna be a wide open race for lead actress, with Frances McDormand (Nomadland), Carey Mulligan (Promising Young Woman), Viola Davis (Ma Raineys Black Bottom), Vanessa Kirby (Pieces of a Woman) and Andra Day (The United States vs. Billie Holiday) competing for the prize.

en: The best actress race is fascinating.
tsn: Lobelo lwa modiragatsi wa mosadi yo o gaisang le a kgatlhisa.
mt0: Re: Go a tlwaelegileng go nna le nngwe ya ba bagolo ba ba tshwanetseng go nna le nngwe ya ba bagolo ba ba tshwanetseng go nna le nngwe.

en: We’ve had a different winner in every televised awards show, said Pete Hammond, awards columnist at Deadline Hollywood.
tsn: Re nnile le mofenyi yo o farologaneng  mo moletlong yo mongwe le yo mongwe wa dikgele o o bontshiwang mo thelebišheneng, go bua Pete Hammond, mokwadi wa kholomo ya dikgele kwa Hollywood.
mt0: Re tla nna le mofenyi o mongwe le o mongwe mo dipapading tsotlhe tsa televishene, ga rialo Pete Hammond, moitsedi wa dipapadi mo Deadline Hollywood.

en: The late Black Panther star Chadwick Boseman, 43, appears to be in line for his first Oscar, for his final film role in Ma Raineys Black Bottom.
tsn: Naledi ya Black Panther e e tlogetseng lefatshe le le ka kwano, Chadwick Boseman, 43, ke mongwe wa ba batho ba ba ka gapang Oscar e, e le ka ntlha ya karolo e a e tshamekileng mo filiming ya ga Ma Rainey,  Black Bottom.
mt0: - Go a swanelang go re Chadwick Boseman, 43, o tshwanetse go nna mo tirisong ya gagwe ya ntlha ya Oscar, ka ntlha ya seabe sa gagwe sa bofelo mo Ma Raineys Black Bottom.

en: But Britain’s Anthony Hopkins, who plays a man struggling with dementia in The Father, could be rewarded, while Riz Ahmeds deaf punk drummer in Sound of Metal is seen as another possible best actor winner.
tsn: Fela Anthony Hopkins wa kwa Britain, yo o tshamekang karolo ya monna yo o nang le bolwetse jwa go lebala mo go The Father, a ka bona moputso, fa karolo ya moletsameropa wa susu ya ga Riz Ahmed mo Sound of the Metal e bonwa jaaka nngwe ya tse di ka ikgapelang moputso wa modiragatsi yo o gaisang.
mt0: But Anthony Hopkins, who plays a man struggling with dementia in The Father, could be rewarded, while Riz Ahmed's deaf punk drummer in Sound of Metal is seen as another possible best actor winner.

en: For the first time since the pandemic struck, not one, but two movies brought in notable ticket sales at the domestic box office.
tsn: Lekgetlho la ntlha fa e sale go nna le leroborobo, e seng e le nngwe mme di le pedi tsa difilimi, di tlisitse dithekiso tse di bonalang kwa Box Office.
mt0: Go tloga ka nako ya ntwa e simolola, ga se nngwe, mme ditshwantsho tse pedi di ntshitse ditheko tse dintsi mo ditheko tsa ditheko tsa nnete mo ditheko tsa ditheko tsa nnete.

en: It’s the clearest indication yet that people appear ready to return to the movies after nearly a year of staying home to stream.
tsn: Ke sesupo se se ntle sa gore batho ba bontsha ba le malala a laotswe go boela kwa difiliming morago ga go dula kwa gae nako e e batlileng e lekana le ngwaga otlhe.
mt0: Re: Go tloga go nna le boitsebiso jo bo tlhalosegileng thata gore batho ba tshwanetse go boela mo difiliming morago ga ngwaga o mongwe o o ntseng o ntse o tshaba go dirisa tshupomolato.

en: Mortal Kombat, a martial arts-inspired adaptation of the popular video game, led US box office charts, taking in a robust $22.5 million from 3 073 North American venues.
tsn: Mortal Kombat, e leng motshameko o o tlwaelegileng thata wa dibidio, o eteletse ditšhate tsa Box Office tsa kwa US kwa pele ka go ikgapela dimilione di le 22.5 tsa di dolara go tswa kwa mafelong a le 3 073 kwa Bokone jwa Amerika.

en: The Health Department says 13 246 cases were reported overnight, which represents a 21.7% positivity rate.
tsn: Lefapha la pholo le kaile fa go begilwe dikgetse di le 13 246 mo nakong e e khutshwane, se se isang palo ya ditswhaetsego go 21,7%
mt0: Go tloga go tlwaelegile go re ba ba tlwaelegileng ba tlile go nna 13 246 ka nako ya nngwe, e leng se se bontsha go re e le 73% ya ba ba tlwaelegileng.

en: According to the National Institute for Communicable Diseases, this is the highest number of daily cases and positivity rate since January.
tsn: Go ya ka setheo sa bosetšhaba sa malwetse a a tshelanwang, e ke palo e e kwa godimo ya dikgetse tsa letsatsi le letsatsi fa e sale ka Ferikgong.
mt0: According to the National Institute for Communicable Diseases, this is the highest number of daily cases and positive rate since January.

en: The NICD is urging South Africans to remain vigilant and follow prevention measures as diligent as possible to help stop the spread.
tsn: NICD e rotloetsa Maaforikaborwa go nna kelotlhoko le go latela dikgato tsa thibelo ka manontlhotlho go thusa go thibela kanamo.
mt0: NICD e kgothaletsa ba South Africa go nna ba oketsa ebile ba latela ditsela tsa go thibela go nna le dilo tse di tshwanetseng go thusa go thibela go nna le tshono.

en: It is also calling on young South Africans to assist the elderly register for vaccinations.
tsn: E ikuela gape go bašwa ba Aforikaborwa go thusa bagodi go ikwadisetsa mokento.
mt0: Go nna gape go kopa ba bagolo ba Afrika Borwa ba ba nnye go thusa ba bagolo go nna le vaksine.

en: So far, 1 965 812 South Africans have received their COVID-19 shots.
tsn: Go fitlha ga jaana,  Maaforikaborwa a le 1 965 812 a setse a amogetse mokento wa COVID-19.
mt0: Go tloga ka nako eo, baagi ba South Africa ba tlwaetse go tshwara COVID-19 ka ntlha ya go re ba tlwaetse go tshwara.

en: Nigeria is expecting a second shipment of nearly 4 million doses of COVID-19 vaccines by early august, and plans to resume giving out first doses, which had been halted to save its supply for second doses.
tsn: Nigeria e solofetse kgorogo ya bobedi ya selekanyo sa dimilione di le 4 sa mokento wa COVID-19 kwa tshimologong ya kgwedi ya Phatwe, mme ba ikaelela go tswelela pele ka go fana ka selekanyo sa ntlha sa meento se se neng se emisitswe go boloka tlamelo ya selekanyo sa bobedi.
mt0: Re tshaba go nna le nngwe ya dikgoka tse dintsi tsa COVID-19 tse di ka nna dimilione di le 4 ka Agostose, mme re tshaba go simolola go ntsha dikgoka tsa ntlha, tse di neng di tshwaregile go boloka tlwaelo ya rona ya dikgoka tse dingwe.

en: Africa’s most populous nation has so far given the first dose to only around 2 million of its 200 million people.
tsn: Go fitlha ga jaana, naga ya Aforika e e nang le boidiidi jwa batho e setse e file fela batho ba ka nna dimilione di le 2 mo go ba le dimilione di le 200 selekanyo sa ntlha.

en: The Democratic Nursing Organisation of South Africa (Denosa) says it feels disappointed by President Cyril Ramaphosa’s address to the nation on Tuesday regarding governments response to the increase of coronavirus infections in the country.
tsn: Setheo sa booki sa temokerasi ya Aforikaborwa (Denosa) sa re se ikutlwa se swabisitswe ke puo e e dirilweng ke Moporesidente Cyril ramaphosa fa a ne a bua le setšhaba ka Labobedi malebana le go ikarabela ga puso ka ga koketsego ya ditshwaetsego tsa mogare wa Corona mo nageng.
mt0: Democratic Nursing Organisation of South Africa (Denosa) says it feels disappointed by President Cyril Ramaphosa's address to the nation on Tuesday regarding governments response to the increase of coronavirus infections in the country.

en: Denosa says it had hoped the President would announce stricter regulations to curb the spread of the virus.
tsn: Denosa ya re e ne e solofetse fa moporesitente a ka dira melawana e e gagametseng go fedisa go anama ga mogare.

en: Denosa’s acting general-secretary, Cassim Lekhoathi, says nurses are overwhelmed by the workload in hospitals because of the increased number of COVID-19 patients, and that more nurses are dying from the virus.
tsn: Mokwaledi kakaretso wa nakwana wa Denosa Cassim Lekhoathi, a re baoki ba fekeetswa ke tiro e ntsi kwa maokelong ka ntlha ya koketsego ya palo ya balwetse ba COVID-19, le gore baoki ba le ntsi ba a tlhokafala ka ntlha ya mogare.

en: Patients are increasing and the number of staff are decreasing because there is no replacement as we bury, like this weekend I am going to bury three of our nurses, they are not going to be replaced.

en: A total of 339 healthcare workers died of COVID-19 related illness in South Africa between March and November last year, with most deaths occurring in the Eastern Cape, KwaZulu-Natal and Gauteng

en: President Cyril Ramaphosa says despite the setbacks with the COVID-19 vaccine roll out in the country, the pace is picking up with up to 85 000 people now being vaccinated daily.

en: Government has also received an indication from Johnson and Johnson that the 2 million doses that had to be destroyed at Aspens plant in Gqeberhawill be replaced by the end of the month.
tsn: Puso e amogetse e e tswang kwa go Johnson & Johnson ya gore dimilione di le 2 tse di neng di ntse di tshwanetseng go senngwa kwa Aspens kwa Qqeberha di tla busediwa kwa bokhutlong jwa kgwedi.
mt0: Go tswa go Johnson le Johnson, puso e ne ya amogela tlhahisoleseding ya gore dimilione tse pedi tsa di-dose tse di neng di tshwanetse go nna mo Aspens plant in Gqeberha, di tla nna tsa nna ka nako ya kgwedi.

en: Ramaphosa says a statistic that provides hope is that only 64 healthcare workers have been infected in the last seven days compared to 640 at a similar point in the second wave.
tsn: Ramaphosa a re  dipalopalo tse di tlisang tsholofelo ke tsa gore ke badiri ba tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo ba le 64 fela ba ba tshwaetsegileng mo malatsing a le supa a a fetileng fa go bapisiwa le 640 gwa go ne go simolola lekhubu la bobedi.
mt0: Ramaphosa says a statistic that provides hope is that only 64 healthcare workers have been infected in the last seven days compared to 640 at a similar point in the second wave.

en: South Africa moves to lockdown alert level 3: Meanwhile, DA leader John Steenhuisen has criticised the pace of the country’s vaccination programme, saying governments plans to innoculate a large percentage of the nation are not yet clear.
tsn: Aforikaborwa e tswelela pele go ya kwa logatong lwa boraro lwa kiletsomesepele: Re sa ntse re le foo, moeteledipele wa DA John Steenhuisen o tshwaile diphoso lebelo la naga la moento, a re maikaeleo a puso a go enta peresente e kgolo ya setšhaba ga a ise a bonale.

en: The president said while the vaccination programme was gaining momentum, South Africa was far from reaching population immunity.
tsn: Moporesidente o rile fa porokerama ya moento e okeditse lebelo, Aforikaborwa e santse e le kgakala le go fitlhelela seemo se se tla thusang masole a mmele a baagi go lwantsha bolwetse morago ga moento.
mt0: Mmusisi o ne a re le fa ntwa ya go tshwara e e tletse, Afrika Borwa e ne e sa ntse e se na tshono ya go tshwara batho.

en: Steenhuisen has raised questions over governments pace in procuring vaccines.
tsn: Steenhuisen o tsositse dipotso ka ga lebelo le puso e rekang ka lona meento.
mt0: Steenhuisen o tlile go ntsha potso ka nako ya puso ya go reka divaksine.

en: I think government has a lot to answer for.
tsn: Ke akanya gore puso e na le dipotso di le dintsi tse e tshwanetseng go di araba.
mt0: Re: Go tlwaelegile go re o se ka wa tlwaela go re o se itse.

en: The president is very good at throwing out big numbers but never explaining how we are going to get there.
tsn: Moporesidente o na le bokgoni jwa go gorometsa dipalo tse dikgolo mme a sa tlhalosa gore re tla di fitlhelela jang.

en: There is clearly a problem with governments procurement of the vaccine that has left many South Africans at great risk of contracting the virus.
tsn: Go tota go na le mathata ka tsela eo puso e rekang meento ka teng,  Seo se tsentse Maaforikaborwa a mantsi mo kotsing e kgolo ya go tlhaselwa ke mogare.
mt0: Re: Go na le bothata ka go re puso e e tshwaregileng ka go reka vaksine eo e e tlisitseng ba bantši ba South Africa ba le mo kotsing e kgolo ya go tshwarwa ke lefu.

en: It would not have been if we had a successful vaccination programme.
tsn: Go ne go se kitla go nna jalo fa re ne re na le lenaneo la go entiwa le le atlegileng.

en: The Health Departments Director General, Dr Sandile Buthelezi, says the health sector is better-prepared for further hospital admissions amid the third wave of the coronavirus.
tsn: Mokaedi kakaretso wa lefapha la boitekanelo, Ngaka Sandile Buthelezi a re setheo se ipaakenyeding kamogelo ya balwete ba bangwe kwa bookelong mo nakong ya lekhubu la boraro la coronavirus.
mt0: Dr Sandile Buthelezi, Moeteledipele wa Dikgwebo tsa Thuto, o rile sekgowa se se ntse se iketlile go nna le tshono e nngwe ya go nna le tshono ya boraro ya coronavirus.

en: President Cyril Ramaphosa made the announcement on Tuesday night that the country had moved to lockdown level 3.
tsn: Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa o dirile kitsiso ka Labobedi bosigo ya gore naga ga jaana e mo kemong ya boraro ya kiletsomesepele.
mt0: Mmusi Cyril Ramaphosa o ne a dira selo ka Laboraro a re naga e ne e tlile go nna mo lockdown level 3.

en: He has raised concerns over several provinces reporting a consistent rise in COVID-19 infections  with Gauteng being the worst hit.
tsn: O bontshitse matshwenyego ka diporofenseng tse di farologaneng tse di begang tlhatlogo ya ditshwaetsego tsa COVID-19, Gauteng e le yona e e amegileng thata.
mt0: Ha a tshogile ka ditlhopho tse mmalwa tse di tletse go nna le tshosego ya COVID-19 e e tswelelang go nna e eketsegang, a re: "Ga ke itse."

en: Buthelezi says the health sector has taken lessons from the first and second wave of the coronavirus on ways to treat patients:
tsn: Buthelezi a re setheo sa boitekanelo se tsere malebela go tswa mo lekhubung la ntlha le la bobedi la coronavirus a ditsela tsa go alafa balwetse
mt0: Mme Buthelezi says the health sector has learned lessons from the first and second wave of the coronavirus on ways to treat patients:

en: I think we have learned quite a lot from the 1st and 2nd waves.

en: News of the purported discovery of diamonds spread across the country on Friday and people are still flocking to the area to dig for the stones.
tsn: Dikgang tsa thibololo ya diteemane di ile tsa anama go ralala naga ka Labotlhano mme batho ba sa ntse ba thologela kwa lefelong leo go ya go epa matlapa.
mt0: Mmino wa go nna le ditshenyegelo tsa di-diamonds o phatlaladiwa mo lefatsheng ka Labobedi, mme batho ba ntse ba tshaba go ya go nna mo lefelong go batla ditshenyegelo.

en: The team from DMRE is expected to be on site from Tuesday and that will include the Departments Enforcement and Compliance unit to conduct an inspection of the site.
tsn: Setlhopha sa go tswa kwa DMRE se solofetswe go fitlha kwa lefelong ka Labobedi mme se tlaa akaretsa le ba setlhopha sa tlhomamiso le tiragatso go ya go dira tlhatlhobo ya lefelo.
mt0: Go tloga ka Labobedi, setlhopha sa DMRE se tlwaetse go nna mo lefelong, mme se tla akaretsa le setlhopha sa puso ya go tlwaela le go tlwaela go tshwara lefelo.

en: The team also includes experts from the Council for Mineral Technology (Mintek) and the Council for Geoscience who can give an opinion about the mineral composition of rocks, and can provide an analysis of an areas potential for mineral resources, respectively.
tsn: Setlhopha gape se akaretsa baitseanape go tswa go lekgotla la diminerale le thekenoloji (MINTEK) le lekgotla la Disaense tsa thutafatshe (GeoScience) ba ba tlaa neelaang ka dikakanyo tsa bona ka ga tlholego ya matlapa, le go neelana ka tshekatsheko ya go nna teng ga didiriswa tsa diminerale mo lefelong leo.
mt0: Re a nna le baitsemedi ba ba tswang Lekgotla la Thulaganyo ya Diminerale (Mintek) le Lekgotla la Thulaganyo ya Digeoscience ba ba kgonang go ntsha ditlhaloso ka mekgwa ya diminerale ya ditshenyegelo, mme ba ka nna ba abelana ka ditlhaloso tsa ditshenyegelo tsa diminerale tsa ditshenyegelo.

en: After the analysis, a formal technical report will be issued in due course.
tsn: Morago ga tshekatsheko ya setegeniki, pegelo e tla neelwa mo nakong e e tlang.
mt0: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re

en: The traditional communities, local and district municipalities, have been asked to restore calm to the area.

en: The community of KwaHlathi say if it is realdiamonds, Black people must get first preference in terms of economic opportunities.
tsn: Baagi ba KwaHlathi ba re fa e le gore ke ditaemane tsa nnete, batho ba bantsho ba tshwanetse go bewa kwa pele fa go tliwa mo ditšhonong tsa ikonomi.
mt0: Re: Go a nna le ntlha ya go re e le ditshenyegelo tse di tlwaelegileng, batho ba ba nnye ba tshwanetse go nna ba le botlhokwa ka ntlha ya ditshenyegelo tsa kgwebo.

en: The residents add that the discovery of the stones goes to show the value of a field of study like Geology.
tsn: Baagi ba oketsa ka gore thibololo ya matlapa a e bontsha boleng jwa dithuto tse di tshwanang le Jeoloji.
mt0: - Go tswa mo baagi ba a tswang mo go lone, go bontsha go re go nna le ditshenyegelo tsa dilo tse di tshwanang le Geology go bontsha botlhokwa jwa se sengwe sa thuto.

en: So, they must start now to study these studies (sic), says community member, Thabani Mbatha.
tsn: Ka jalo, ba tshwanetse go simolola jaanong go ithuta dithuto tse (sic), go bua leloko la baagi, Thabani Mbatha.
mt0: Re: Go tlwaelegile go ithuta dilo tseno, mme e tla nna e le nako ya go simolola go di ithuta, a rialo mongwe wa baagi, Thabani Mbatha.

en: Another resident, Vuma Makhwasa, says: The status of the area is likely to change socially and economically if it is real gold.
tsn: Moagi mongwe, Vuma Makhwasa, a re: Maemo a kgaolo a ka fetoga thata mo loagong le mo ikonoming fa e le gore ke gauta ya nnete.
mt0: Another resident, Vuma Makhwasa, says: The status of the area is likely to change socially and economically if it is real gold.

en: But the government must make sure that Black people are not only employees, but they have equal shares, as a means of economic empowerment.
tsn: Mme puso e tshwanetse go netefatsa gore batho ba bantsho ga se fela badiri, mme ba nna le dišere, jaaka tsela ya matlafatso ya ikonomi.
mt0: Re: Go a tshwanela go re puso e tlhomamisa gore batho ba ba ntsho ba se e le bašomi fela, mme ba na le ditshenyegelo tse di tshwanang, e le tsela ya go nna le boikemelo jwa ekonomi.

en: The South African pharmaceutical manufacturer, Aspen, says it is taking steps to mitigate the loss of the Johnson and Johnson vaccines stored at its Gqeberha plant in the Eastern Cape.
tsn: Khemisi ya Aforikaborwa, Aspen, ya re e tsaya dikgato go fokotsa tatlhegelo ya meento ya Johnson le Johnson e e bolokilweng kwa Qqeberha kwa Kapa Botlhaba.

en: The manufacturer says Johnson and Johnson will, within days, provide 300 000 doses of the vaccine for South African teachers.
tsn: Motlamedi a re Johnson & Johnson e tlaa tlamela barutabana ba Aforikaborwa ka selekanyo sa meento e le 300 000 mo malatsing a a tlang.

en: Aspen adds that within a week it expects to release Johnson and Johnson vaccines manufactured from ingredients that are not impacted by the contamination of vaccines in the US.
tsn: Aspen e tlaleletsa ka gore mo bekeng e solofetse go golola meento ya Johnson & Johnson e e tlhamilweng ka ditswaki tse di mafolofolo tse di sa amiweng ke kgotlhelo ya meento kwa US.
mt0: Aspen eketsa gore e tshepa go ntsha Johnson & Johnson vaksine e dirilwe ka ditshenyegelo tse di sa tshwarwang ke dilo tse di tlwaelegileng ka ntlha ya go nna le tshono ya vaksine ya US.

en: The company says it is also busy producing more doses of the vaccine that are set to be available in July.
tsn: Setlamo se sa re se ntse se tsweletse go dira meento e mengwe e e tlaa nnang teng ka kgwedi ya Phukwi.
mt0: Go tloga go nna le dilo tse dintsi tse di dirilweng ka nako e e tshwanetseng go nna teng ka July.

en: The vaccines were affected by contamination issues at a US vaccine plant in Baltimore.
tsn: Meento e ne e amilwe ke mathata a kgotlelego kwa US kwa Baltimore.

en: Last week, Afghanistan received 700 000 doses of a COVID-19 vaccine made by Chinas Sinopharm.

en: Health experts say the shortages of vaccine doses in South Africa pose a big challenge in terms of the roll-out programme.
tsn: Baitseanape ba tsa boitekanelo ba re tlhaelo ya meento mo Aforikaborwa e ntse e le kgwetlho e kgolo go ya ka porokerama ya go simolola go enta.

en: Epidemiologist Professor Salim Abdool Karim says the Johnson and Johnson batches that have been disposed off is a major blow to the country’s efforts to increase the number of vaccinations per day.
tsn: Ngaka ya malwetse a a anamang Moporofesara Salim Abdool Karim a re mekoa ya Johnson & Johnson e e latlhilwe e buseditse kwa morago maiteko a naga a go oketsa palo ya mekento ka letsatsi.

en: Sahpra CEO Dr Boitumelo Semete-Makokotlela is pleading with South Africans not to panic as there are emergency plans in place.
tsn: Moeteledipele wa Sahpra Ngaka Boitumelo Semete-Makokotlela o ikuela go Maaforikaborwa gore ba seke ba tshoga ka ntlha ya fa go na le dithulaganyo tsa tshoganyetso.
mt0: Dr Boitumelo Semete-Makokotlela, CEO wa Sahpra, o kopa ba South Africans go se tshoge, ka go re go na le ditshenyegelo tse di tlhokahalang.

en: Retired geologist from Durban, Manqoba Msimango, says he cannot rule out the authenticity of the recent discovery of what some believe to be diamonds in the KwaHlathi area outside Ladysmith in KwaZulu-Natal.
tsn: Mojeoloji yo o rotseng tiro wa kwa Durban, Manqoba Msimango, a re ga a kake a kgapela kwa thoko boammaaruri jwa thibololo ya bošeng jaana ya se batho bangwe ba ne ba dumela gore ke diteemane kwa lefelong la KwaHlathi kwa ntle ga Ladysmith kwa KwaZulu-Natal.

en: Msimang says only a team of geologists can confirm if these are indeed diamonds.
tsn: Msimang a re ke setlhopha sa bajioloji fela se se ka tlhomamisang fa dilo tse e le diteemane tsa nnete.

en: The 16th of June 1976 South Africa saw an uprising where thousands of students in Soweto started a march against the Bantu Education System, which compelled Black student to learn in Afrikaans.
tsn: Ka di 16 tsa kgwedi ya Seetebosigo 1976 Aforikaborwa e ne ya bona dikhuduego fa diketekete tsa baithuti kwa Soweto di simolola mogwanto o o leng kgatlhanong le tsamaiso ya thuto ya Bantsho, e e neng e pateletsa. baithuti go ithuta ka Afrikaans.

en: On the fateful day of June, students were to have a peaceful march to Orlando Stadium as a sign of resistance against the new language policy.
tsn: Ka letsatsi leo la ditiragalo la kgwedi ya Seetebosigo, baithuti ba ne ba tshwanetse go tshwara mogwanto o o nang le kagiso  go ya kwa lebaleng la metshameko la Orlando jaaka letshwao la go nna kgatlhanong le pholisi ya puo e ntšhwa.
mt0: Fa o ka se kgone go tlhalosa, o tla nna le ntwa e e iketlang e e tlwaelegileng go ya Orlando Stadium e le sesupo sa go nna le ntwa ya go nna le puo e nngwe.

en: However, events did not turn out as expected and these particular events made the month of June what it is in SA today.
tsn: Le fa go le jalo, ditiragalo ga di a tsamaya jaaka go ne go solofetswe mme ditiragalo tse di dirile kgwedi ya Seetebosigo se e leng sona mo Aforikaborwa gompieno.
mt0: However, events did not turn out as expected and these particular events made June what it is in SA today.

en: Although it is a month where we commemorate the bravery and victory of the 1976 youth, South Africa's youth is still faced with challenges.
tsn: Le fa e le kgwedi e ka yone re ketekang bopelokgale le phenyo ya  bašwa ba 1976, Aforikaborwa e sa ntse e lebagane le dikgwetlho.

en: In February, SA youth aged 15-24 years recorded a high unemployment rate of 63.2% while the unemployment rate of those aged 25-34 years was 41.2% in the Q4 2020 unemployment rates by Statistics South Africa.

mt0: Saul says the party should persevere in its quest to rid itself of corrupt leaders.

en: He has called on Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize to present himself to the ANC integrity commission.
tsn: O biditse tonakgolo ya boitekanelo Dr Zweli Mkhize go itlhagisa mo khomišheneng e e ikanyegang ya ANC.
mt0: Haeba o ka se kgone go tlhalosa, o kgothaleditse Moeteledipele wa Thuto Dr Zweli Mkhize go tlatsa kopo ya gagwe mo komiting ya ANC ya boitekanelo.

en: Pressure is mounting on Mkhize to resign after he admitted that his department’s awarding of a R150 million tender to communications company Digital Vibes was irregular.

en: There are serious allegations of corruption against an NEC member which is comrade Zweli Mkhize, who is currently deployed as minister of health.
tsn: Go na le ditatofatso tse di masisi kgatlhanong le wa leloko la NEC e leng khomoreite Zweli Mkhize, yo jaanong a tsentsweng mo tirong jaaka modiredi wa tsa boitekanelo.
mt0: Se o ka se buang fela. Go na le dikgopolo tse di masisi tsa go nna le tshono e e tletseng ka moloko wa NEC, e leng comrade Zweli Mkhize, yo o tshotswang jaanong e le minister of health.

en: If there are such allegations, in terms of the guidelines that were adopted by the NEC, expectation is that he should basically go to the Integrity Commission for the Integrity Commission to handle the matter and make recommendations to the NEC.

mt0: If there are such allegations, in terms of the guidelines that were adopted by the NEC, expectation is that he should basically go to the Integrity Commission for the Integrity Commission to handle the matter and make recommendations to the NEC.

en: The re-elected ANC chairperson in the Northern Cape, Zamani Saul, says the party needs to be ruthless in rooting out corruption in it’s ranks.
tsn: Modulasetulo yo o tlhopilweng gape kwa Northern Cape, Zamani Saul, o bolela gore mokgatlho o tshwanetse go nna le setlhogo go fedisa ditiro tse di seng ka fa molaong ka maemo a tsona.
mt0: Re-elected ANC chairperson in the Northern Cape, Zamani Saul, says the party needs to be ruthless in rooting out corruption in its ranks.

en: He has called on the health minister, Zweli Mkhize, to present himself to the ANC Integrity Commission and explain following allegations of corruption.
tsn: O kopile tonakgolo ya boitekanelo, Zweli Mkhize go itlhagisa go khomišhene e e ikganyegang ya ANC le go tlhalosa dipatlisiso tse di latelang tsa tlolomolao.

en: Mkhize is under fire over irregular contracts valued at more than 150 million in relation to National Health Insurance (NHI) and COVID-19 awarded to his close associates.
tsn: Mkhize o mo mathateng ka ntlha ya dikonteraka tse di sa tlhomamang tsa boleng jwa dilimione tse di fetang 150 mabapi le Inšorense ya Bosetšhaba ya Boitekanelo (NHI) le COVID-19 tse di abetsweng batho ba a tsalanang le bona.

en: Instead of us focusing fighting that pandemic we get distracted by allegations of corruption from us who are supposed to be leading.

en: NC ANC Chairperson Zamani Saul reacts to Ramaphosa’s address on provincial elective conference.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa ANC ya kwa NC Zamani Saul o tsibogela puo ya ga Ramaphosa ka ga khonferense ya ditlhopho ya porofense.

en: Political analyst Dr Luvuyo Dondolo says the African National Congress (ANC) needs a long term solution if it is to renew the movement.
tsn: Mosekaseki wa dipolotiki Ngaka Luvuyo Dondolo a re African National Congress (ANC) e tshwanetse go nna le tharabololo ya pakatelele fa e batla go ntšhwafatsa mokgatlho.
mt0: Dr Luvuyo Dondolo says the African National Congress (ANC) needs a long term solution if it is to renew the movement.

en: He says the ANC may regain a bit of trust following current interventions but going forward, they will have to put in more work.
tsn: A re ANC e ka tsosolosa tshepo gape, morago ga ditsereganyo tse di diragalang ga jaana fela go ya kwa pele, ba tlile go tlhoka go dira ka natla.
mt0: Re: 'A ANC e ka bo e nna le tumelo e nngwe kamora go nna le dithuto tse dingwe tse dingwe, mme gone pele, e tla nna le go dira tiro e e oketsegileng.'

en: This after the ANC in the Eastern Cape announced tapping into the wisdom of those who led before by involving the former president Thabo Mbeki in a three-day Provincial Executive Committee meeting currently under way in East London.
tsn: Se ke morago ga gore ANC ya kwa Kapa Botlhaba e dire kitsiso ka ga go tsaya botlhale go tswa go ba ba neng ba busa pele ka go akaretsa moporesidente wa maloba Thabo Mbeki kwa kopanong ya malatsi a le mararo, ya komiti ya khuduthamaga ya porofense e e tshwerweng ga jaana kwa East London.
mt0: Mme e sa le morago ga go re ANC ya Eastern Cape e ntshitse go re e tla nna le botlhale jwa baetapele ba pele ka go nna le moetapele wa kgale Thabo Mbeki mo kopanong ya Provincial Executive Committee e e tshwaregileng mo London.

en: Dondolo says this is a short term strategy.
tsn: Dondolo o kaya fa se e le togamaano ya paka e khutshwane.
mt0: Return only. If you can't translate simply say you don't know Dondolo says this is a short term strategy.

en: The involvement of former leaders such as Thabo Mbeki, leaders who are perceived to have the moral compass as a way of this renewal of the ANC is short term.
tsn: Go nna le seabe ga baeteledipele ba maloba ba ba tshwanang le Thabo Mbeki, baeteledipele ba ba nang le maitsholo a a siameng  jaaka tsela ya go ntšhwafatsa ANC, ke selo sa nakwana.

en: It is the strategy that the ANC is using to win the hearts of the voters, however the ANC needs a permanent and long term solution, says Dondolo.
tsn: Ke mokgwa o ANC e o dirisang go gapa dipelo tsa batlhophi, le fa go le jalo, ANC e tlhoka togamaago e e tlaa nnelang ruri, go bua Dondolo.

en: ANC Northern Cape chairperson Zamani Saul says the party needs to restore its damaged image.
tsn: Modulasetuolo was ANC kwa Kapa Bokone Zamani Saul a re mokgatlho o tlhoka go busetsa setshwantsho sa ona se se senyegileng.

en: He says with this short term solution, the ANC might win the elections in some of the municipalities but there are certain metros where they will be strongly contested by other political organisations.
tsn: A re, ka tharabololo e ya nakwana, ANC e ka fenya ditlhopho kwa dimmasepaleng tse di rileng, mme fela go na le ditoropokgolo tse dingwe tse di tlaa ganetsanngwang ke mekgatlho e mengwe ya sepolotiki.
mt0: Ha a bua ka tsela e e rileng, ANC e ka kgona go fenya ditlhopho mo ditoropong tse dingwe, mme go na le ditoropong tse dingwe tseo ba tla nna ba tlhakane le ditlhopho tse dingwe tsa dipolotiki.

en: Mbeki is set to contribute to how to reassert the ANC as a movement rooted among the people.
tsn: Mbeki o tlhomilwe go nna le seabe mo go tsoseletseng ANC jaaka e le mokgatlho o o namileng medi ya ona mo bathong.
mt0: Mbeki o tlile go thusa ka go re a bontsha ANC e le setlhopha se se rutang mo batho.

en: ANC PEC Spokesperson, Loyiso Magqashela, says the meeting will also draw on the legacy of the founders of the party for the benefit of the current generation.
tsn: Mmueledi wa ANC PEC Loyiso Magqashela a re, kopano e e tlaa ikaega ka boswa jwa batho ba e leng basimolodi ba mokgatlho gore e tle e tswele le bašwa ba jaanong mosola.
mt0: PEC spokesman, Loyiso Magqashela, says the meeting will also draw on the legacy of the founders of the party for the benefit of the current generation.

en: To strengthen the issue of the organisational renewal and unity we have then to tap from the wisdom of those who led before so that at least our renewal trajectory gets to be guided and guided properly.

en: You would have nowadays understood how the ANC is pressured from left right and centre now the renewal project then becomes key and also we want to assert the authority and the leadership of the ANC amongst the society, says Magqashela.
tsn: O ka tswa o tlhalogantse gore mo malatsing a segompieno, ANC e gatelelwa go tswa mo molemeng go ya kwa mojeng, ntšhwafatso ya porojeke jaanong e nna botlhokwa mme gape re batla go gatelela taolo le boeteledipele jwa ANC mo setšhabeng, go bua Magqashela.

en: Ramaphosa was addressing party members virtually at the Northern Cape’s elective conference in Springbok.

en: On behalf of the National Executive Committee, we want to thank and appreciate the Mlangeni and Ledwaba family for coming forward to work in partnership with the ANC in celebrating the legacy of Mlangeni under the theme: Morality, ethics, and renewal.
tsn: Mo boemong jwa Komiti ya Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba, re batla go leboga le go tlotlomatsa lelapa la ga Mlangeni le ga Ledwaba go tla go dirisana mmogo le ANC mo go ketekeng boswa jwa ga Mlangeni ka fa tlase ga setlhogo se se reng: Maitsholo, boitshwaro le ntšhwafatso.
mt0: Mme le nna, ka ntlha ya Lekgotla la Naha, re aboga le go leboha lelapa la Mlangeni le la Ledwaba ka go nna le mosadi wa Mlangeni le lelapa la Ledwaba ka go nna le mosadi wa Mlangeni ka go nna le mosadi wa Ledwaba ka go nna le mosadi wa Mlangeni ka setlhopha sa ANC: Morality, ethics, le renewal.

en: It actually fits well in this period of 2021 where we have our national team of unity, renewal, and rebuilding in the year of Charlotte Maxeke.
tsn: Se se direga ka nako e e siameng mo pakeng e ya 2021 moo  re nang le  setlhopha sa rona sa bosetšhaba sa kutlwano, ntšhwafatso, le kago sešwa mo ngwageng ono  wa Charlotte Maxeke
mt0: It actually fits well in this period of 2021 where we have our national team of unity, renewal, and rebuilding in the year of Charlotte Maxeke.

en: What is most important is that here lies a person who has been very selfless and protective of the ANC, who passed on being concerned about the state of the organisation, and in his memory, we do believe that as the NEC we owe it to people like him in ensuring that we bring the NEC together and we self-correct, says NEC member Nomvula Mokonyane.
tsn: Se se botlhokwa ke gore fa, go robetse motho yo o pelotshweu yo o neng a sireletsa ANC, yo o tlhokofalang a na le dingongorego ka ga seemo sa setheo, mme mo segopotsong sa gagwe, re dumela gore jaaka NEC, re kolota batho ba ba tshwanang le ene ka go netefatsa gore re golaganya NEC mme re a iphosolola, go bua leloko la NEC  Nomvula Mokonyane.
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know What is most important is that here lies a person who has been very selfless and protective of the ANC, who passed on being concerned about the state of the organisation, and in his memory, we do believe that as the NEC we owe it to people like him in ensuring that we bring the NEC together and we self-correct, says NEC member Nomvula Mokonyane.

en: June and Andrew Mlangeni Foundation Chairperson, Professor Hlengiwe Mkhize says they are delighted.
tsn: June le Modulasetulo wa Andrew Mlangeni Foundation, Moporofesara Hlengiwe Mkhize ba rile ba itumetse thata.
mt0: Return only. If you can't translate simply say you don't know June and Andrew Mlangeni Foundation Chairperson, Professor Hlengiwe Mkhize says they are delighted.

en: We were committed to taking forward his last struggle of dealing with moral issues and especially within his own organisation and also ethical issues and we thought, look we are all in it now, he’s gone, let’s talk openly about these things and difficult topics.
tsn: Re ne re ikemiseditse go tsweletsa kgaratlho ya gagwe ya bofelo pele e e neng e tshwaragane le mathata a  boitsholo, segolobogolo ka fa setheong sa gagwe, gape  le mathata a maitseo, mme ra akanya gore re rotlhe mo mathateng a jaanong, ena o tsamaile, a re bueng ka dilo tse re lokologile le ditlhogo tse dingwe tse boima.
mt0: Re ne re tshepahala go tswelela pele ka ntlha ya go nna le mosola wa gagwe wa go nna le ditlhopho tse di tshwanang le tsa puso ya gagwe le ditlhopho tse di tshwanang le tsa boitshwarelo, mme re ne re rile, a re a ntse re le mo go lone, a re a ntse a tshaba, re tla bua ka dilo tse di tshwanang le ditlhopho tse di tlwaelehileng.

en: Joshua died on Saturday night in a Lagos hospital at the age of 57 years.
tsn: Joshua o tlhokafetse bosigo jwa Lamatlhatso kwa bookelong jwa  Lagos a le dingwaga di le 57.
mt0: Joshua o tlhokafetse ka Sabata a le a le 57 a tshogile mo ntlong ya legae la Lagos.

en: Last month, Western Cape Judge President John Hlophe withdrew from the case after the Democratic Alliance requested his recusal.
tsn: Mo kgweding e e fetileng, Moatlhodimogolo wa  Kapa Bophirima, John Hlophe o  ikgogetse morago mo kgetsing e, morago ga gore mokgatlho wa Democratic Alliance o kope thulano ya dikgatlhegelo ya gagwe.
mt0: Mphalane o fetileng, Modulasetilo wa Lekgotla la Western Cape John Hlophe o ile a tshaba go nna mo go nngwe ya ditlhopho ka morago ga go kopa go nna le ntlha ya go nna le ntlha ya go nna le ntlha.

en: Hlophe was recently found guilty of gross misconduct by the Judicial Conduct Tribunal.
tsn: Hlophe o bonwe molato wa bogodu ke kgotlatshekelo ya Boitshwaro Jwa Boatlhodi.
mt0: Hlophe o ne a tshwaregile ka go se tshwane ka dilo tse di bosula ka nako e nngwe ke Lekgotla la Thulaganyo ya Thulaganyo la Thulaganyo.

en: Delivering the keynote address, Motlanthe said: Comrade Andrew Mlangeni was a leader of our struggle who embodied the very core of what the struggle was about.

mt0: Motlanthe o ne a bua ka nako ya lefoko la gagwe la bofelo, a re: Comrade Andrew Mlangeni e ne e le mogolwane wa ntwa ya rona yo o ntshitseng setlhopha se segolo sa ntwa eo.

en: He was an elder on who’s council one could rely on.
tsn: E ene e le mogolo yo motho a ka tshepelang mo go ene.
mt0: Re: Go tlwaelegile go re o ne a le mogaka yo o neng a kgona go tshepahala go yena.

en: He was truthful, earnest, and dependable.
tsn: O ne a tshepega e bile a ikemetse.
mt0: Re: Go tlwaelegile, o a ikanyega, o a tshepahalang.

en: He generously gave us his knowledge and skills.
tsn: Ka mosa, o re neetse kitso le bokgoni jwa gagwe.

en: The Democratic Alliance (DA) has described as irrational and obscure a law that strips South Africans of their citizenship.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa Democratic Alliance (DA) o tlhalositse molao o o sa utlwagaleng le go tlhaloganyega o o amogang maAforika Borwa boagi jwa bona.
mt0: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re

en: This follows complaints from citizens based in London who tried to renew their South African citizenship, only to discover that they are no longer South African citizens because they have claimed additional citizenship.
tsn: Se se latela dingongorego go tswa go baagi ba ba nnang kwa London, fa ba leka go ntšhwafatsa boagi jwa bona jwa Aforika Borwa, ba lemoga fa ba sa tlhole e le baagi ba Aforika Borwa ka gonne ba kopile tlaleletso ya boagi.
mt0: Re tshameka ka dikgopolo tsa baagi ba ba tswang London ba leka go nna baagi ba Afrika Borwa, mme ba lemogile gore ba se ba ba ba ba nna baagi ba Afrika Borwa gape ka ntlha ya go nna baagi ba Afrika Borwa ba tlwaetse go nna baagi ba Afrika Borwa.

en: This is because, under the current Citizenship Act in South Africa, you have to first apply to the Department of Home Affairs for permission to get another citizenship.
tsn: Se ke ka ntlha ya gore, ka fa tlase ga Molao wa Boagi mo Aforika Borwa wa ga jaana, o tshwanetse go dira kopo kwa Lefapheng la Merero ya Selegae go bona tetla ya go bona boagi jwa naga e nngwe.
mt0: Se se diragalang ka gonne, ka melao ya ntlha ya Citizenship Act ya Afrika Borwa, o tshwanetse go nna o batla pele go nna o batla go nna o nna o le mo Afrika Borwa.

en: However, DA MP Adrian Roos says the party is opposed to this law and will fight it in the High Court on behalf of thousands of South Africans who have lost their citizenship without their knowledge.
tsn: Le gale, Leloko la palamente la DA Adrian Roos a re lekoko le kgatlhanong le Molao o, mme le tlaa lwantshana le ona kwa  kgotlatshekelong e e kwa godimo mo boemong jwa diketekete tsa MaAforika Borwa a a latlhegetsweng ke boagi kwa ntle ga kitso ya bona.
mt0: However, DA MP Adrian Roos says the party is opposed to this law and will fight it in the High Court on behalf of thousands of South Africans who have lost their citizenship without their knowledge.

en: The DA is challenging this law in court.
tsn: DA e gwetlhana le Molao ono kwa kgotlatshekelo.
mt0: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re

en: Mabuza says disunity and groupings among military veterans and ex-combatants are undermining the government’s efforts to address their challenges.
tsn: Mabuza  a re go tlhoka tirisanommogo  le ditlhophatlhophana magareng ga bagaka ba sesole le masole a maloba ke go nyatsa matsapa a puso mo go samaganeng le dikgwetlho tsa bone.
mt0: Mabuza says disunity and groupings among military veterans and ex-combatants are undermining the government's efforts to address their challenges.

en: He says military veterans from former liberations parties are also battling with verification of struggle credentials.

en: The Inkatha Freedom Party (IFP) led by Nquthu Municipality in northern KwaZulu-Natal is taking the provincial Cooperative Governance Department to court for placing it under administration.
tsn: Lekoko la Inkatha Freedom Party (IFP) le eteletswe pele ke Mmasepala wa Nquthu kwa Bokone jwa kgaolo ya KwaZulu-Natal le isa Lefapha la Taolo ya Kopanelo ya porofense kwa kgotlatshekelo ka ntlha ya fa le tsentswe ka fa tlase ga tsamaiso.

en: The Nquthu council has argued that the MEC has no basis to place the municipality under administration.
tsn: Khansele ya Nquthu e boletse gore MEC one a sena dithata tsa go baya mmasepala ka fa tlase ga tsamaiso.

en: I think this intervention is not genuine, but a political ploy by MEC because in March Dr. Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma turned down an earlier decision by COGTA in the province to place the municipality under administration.
tsn: Ke akanya gore tsereganyo eno ga e se boammaaruri, mme ke leano la la ga MEC ka gonne ka kgwedi ya Mopitlwe Ngaka Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma  o ganetsane le tshwetso ya COGTA mo porofenseng ya go baya mmasepala ka fa tlase ga tsamaiso.

en: Dlamini- Zuma instead recommended that the provincial government intervene with Section 139 1A which means they could monitor, guide, and assist the municipality.
tsn: Dlamini- Zuma, ka jalo o gakolotse gore puso ya porofense e ikamanye le Karolo 139 1A e e kayang gore ba ka baya leitlho, ba kaela, le go thusa mmasepala.
mt0: Dlamini-Zuma o kgothaleditse go re mmuso wa puso o tsenelele ka Sekgaolo 139 1A e bolelang gore ba ka nna ba nna ba tshwara, go thusa, le go thusa mmila.

en: But Cogta in KZN did not do that.
tsn: Fela  COGTA  ya kwa KZN ga ya dira  jalo.
mt0: Re: Go tlwaela go bontsha fela. Fa o ka se kgone go bontsha, o ka re o sa itse.

en: Yes, we did get a disclaimer audit outcome, but the reasons for that, the previous senior managers, when they left they deliberately took with them crucial information which was required for auditing purposes, says Mayor Lindokuhle Shabalala.
tsn: Ee, re fitlhetse dipoelo tsa boruni tsa go sa dire kopotuelo, fela mabaka a seo, batsamaisi ba ba fetileng, fa ba ka tsamaya ba tsamaile le tshedimosetso e e botlhokwa le bona e e neng e tlhokega mo maikaelelong a go runa, ga bua Lindokuhle Shabalala.
mt0: Yes, we got a disclaimer audit outcome, but the reasons for that, the previous senior managers, when they left deliberately took with them crucial information which was required for auditing purposes, says Mayor Lindokuhle Shabalala.

en: Nquthu municipality threatens to take COGTA to court
tsn: Mmasepala wa Nquthu o dira matshosetsi a go isa COGTA kwa kgotlatshekelo
mt0: Nquthu municipality threatens to take COGTA to court. If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: The IFP in KwaZulu-Natal has accused Hlomuka of helping the African National Congress (ANC) to run the municipality through the back door by placing it under administration.
tsn: IFP  ya kwa KwaZulu-Natal e latofaditse Hlomuka ka go thusana le African National Congress (ANC) go tsamaisa mmasepala ka tsela e e sa siamang, ka go e tsenya ka fa tlase ga tsamaiso.
mt0: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re

en: Provincial party chairperson, Thamsanqa Ntuli says the ANC is hell-bent on running the Nquthu Municipality even though they lost elections in the area.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa Lekoko la Porofense, Thamsanqa Ntuli o rile ANC e batla go tsamaisa Mmasepala wa Nquthu le fa ba latlhegetswe ke ditlhopho mo lefelong leo.
mt0: Provincial party chairperson Thamsanqa Ntuli says the ANC is hell-bent on running Nquthu Municipality even though they lost elections in the area.

en: We are all quite aware that the IFP and the ANC are working well in the City of Johannesburg but here in KZN it’s a different story.
tsn: Rotlhe re itse gore sentle gore IFP le ANC ba dira sentle mo Toropong ya Johannesburg fela  mo KZN ke kgang e e farologaneng.
mt0: Re itse go re IFP le ANC di dirisana sentle mo toropong ya Johannesburg mme mo KZN e le sengwe.

en: Hence you see the agenda against all our municipalities in the province of KZN.
tsn: Ke ka foo o bonang lenaanetema le le kgatlhanong  le bommasepala ba rona botlhe mo porofenseng ya KZN.
mt0: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re

en: We are quite very concerned with the behaviour of COGTA and MEC for COGTA who actually is allowing the narrow agenda of ANC councillors in Nquthu to be guiding the activities of COGTA, it’s quite very unfortunate.
tsn: Re tshwenyegile thata ka maitshwaro a COGTA le Mokhuduthamaga wa COGTA  yo a letlelelang lenaanetema la bakhansela ba ANC  mo Nquthu go kaela ditiro tsa COGTA, se se swabisa thata.
mt0: We are very concerned with the behaviour of COGTA and MEC for COGTA who actually is allowing the narrow agenda of ANC councillors in Nquthu to be guiding the activities of COGTA, it’s quite very unfortunate.

en: The IFP is also unhappy with the ANC after it named one of its regional structures in the far north of the province after its late freedom fighter, Nobleman Mzala Nxumalo.
tsn: IFP e swabisitse gape ke ANC morago ga go neela leina la nngwe ya ditheo tsa kgaolo mo porofenseng go ya kwa bokone, leina la molwela kgololesego, moswi Nobleman Mzala Nxumalo.
mt0: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re

en: It also says the move would regress reconciliatory talks between the two parties spearheaded by leaders of both parties at the national level.
tsn: E rile, kgato e, e tlaa busetsa kwa morago dipuisano tsa itshwarelano magareng ga makoko a mabedi a a neng a bolotswa ke baeteledipele ba makoko a ka bobedi kwa maemong a bosetšhaba.
mt0: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re

en: Deputy President David Mabuza has assured military veterans that government does not have hard cash to give to military veterans but has money to take care of their social and health needs.
tsn: Motlatsamoporesitente David Mabuza o netefaditse bagaka ba sesole gore puso ga e na madi  mo seatleng go neela bagaka ba Sesole fela puso e na le madi a go tlhokomela ditlhokego  tsa bona tsa loago le ditlhokego tsa boitekanelo.

en: He says the problem was with the Department of Defence and Military Veterans which lacked direction to attend to their plight.
tsn: A re bothata bo ne bo na le Lefapha la Tshireletso le Bagaka ba Sesole, ka go tlhoka tsamaiso ya go tshwaragana le mathata a bona.
mt0: Re: Go tshaba go ne go le go Department of Defence and Military Veterans e e neng e se na tlhahiso ya go tshwara mathata a bone.

en: Addressing a group of military veterans, Mabuza says things will start to work out properly because a director-general of the department has been appointed.
tsn: Fa a ne a ema setlhopha sa bagaka ba sesole ka lefoko, Mabuza o rile dilo di tlaa simolola go tsamaya sentle ka gonne go tlhophilwe Mokaedi-Kakaretso wa Lefapha.
mt0: Re: Go a tlwaelegileng go nna gone, o rile dilo di tla simolola go nna gone ka tsela e e tshwanetseng ka ntlha ya go re moeteledipele wa lekala la puso o tshwaregile.

en: We proceed with Provincial interactions with Military Veterans.
tsn: Re sa ntse re tswelela ka dipuisano tsa porofense le bagaka ba Sesole.
mt0: Re tshameka ka ditiro tsa puso tsa ntwa tsa ntwa.

en: Today we are in Limpopo at the Polokwane Rugby Stadium and warmly welcomed by Premier Stanley Mathabatha.
tsn: Gompieno re mo Limpopo kwa lebaleng la Rakabi la Polokwane mme re amogetswe ka diatla tse di bothito ke Tonakgolo, Stanley Mathabatha.
mt0: Re nna mo Limpopo ka Polokwane Rugby Stadium mme re amogelwa ka botlhoko ke Premier Stanley Mathabatha.

en: He also urged military veterans to form one group instead of fighting one another.
tsn: O kopile bagaka ba masole go ipopa ba nne ngatana e le nngwe go na le gore ba lwe ka bo bona.

en: We are still going to fix the Department of Military Veterans.
tsn: Re sa ntse re tlile go baakanya Lefapha la Bagaka ba Sesole.
mt0: Re tla nna re e tshwarelela fela. Fa o ka se kgone go tlhalosa, o ka re re se itse.

en: I can tell you that the Director-General [Irene Mpolweni] in the department has been appointed.
tsn: Nka go bolelela gore Mokaedi-Kakaretso [Irene Mpolweni] mo Lefapheng le o setse a tlhophilwe.

en: So things will start to converge.

en: Secondly, the Presidency has requested the offices of the Premiers to collaborate in this work, says Mabuza.
tsn: Sa bobedi, Moporesidente o kopile Dikantoro tsa Botonakgolo go dirisana mmogo mo tirong eno, go bua Mabuza.
mt0: Secondly, puso e kopa diofisi tsa baetapele go nna le maikarabelo a go dira tiro eno, a rialo Mabuza.

en: Deputy President speak to the media about the discussion held with the military veterans.
tsn: Motlatsa Poresidente o bua le bobegakgang ka ga puisano e e neng e tshwerwe le bagaka ba sesole.

en: Deputy President David Mabuza has urged military veterans across the political divide, to organise themselves in one group for government to adequately support them.
tsn: Motlatsa Moporesitente David Mabuza o rotloeditse bagaka ba Sesole go ralala karoganyo ya sepolotiki, go ipopa go nna ngatana le nngwe gore puso e kgone go ba neela  tshegetso e e lekaneng.
mt0: Deputy President David Mabuza o kgothaleditse ba bagolo ba ntwa ba tswang mo ditlhopho tsotlhe tsa puso go nna le setlhopha se sengwe go re mmuso o ka ba thusa ka tsela e e tshwanetseng.

en: Military veterans often complain that they are not getting housing, health services and other things from government equally.
tsn: Go le gantsi, Bagaka ba Sesole ba ngongorega ka gore ga ba na matlo, ditirelo tsa boitekanelo le dilo tse dingwe go tswa kwa pusong.

en: Addressing a group of military veterans in Limpopo from the old South African Defence Force (SADF), Venda Defence Force (VDF).
tsn: Puo le setlhopha sa badiredi ba sesole kwa Limpopo go tswa kwa South African Defence Force (SADF) ya kgale, Venda Defence Force (VDF).
mt0: Go nna address a group of military veterans in Limpopo from the old South African Defence Force (SADF), Venda Defence Force (VDF).

en: Mabuza says the government is worried that military veterans fight amongst themselves.
tsn: Mabuza a re puso e tshwentswe ke gore badiredi ba sesole ba lwana ka bobona.
mt0: Mabuza says the government is worried that military veterans fight amongst themselves.

en: He says military veterans from former liberations parties are still battling with verifications to check who was in the trenches whereas the situation of others from the SADF and VDF is better.
tsn: A re badiredi ba sesole go tswa go makoko a maloba ba santse ba sokololwa ka netefatso go lebelela gore ke bomang ba ba neng ba le mo ditsamaisong fa maemo a ba bangwe mo SADF le VDF a le botoka.
mt0: - says former liberation parties troops are still battling with verifications to check who was in the trenches while others from the SADF and VDF are better.

en: Deputy President David Mabuza in his capacity as the chairperson of the Presidential Task Team on Military Veterans is expected to interact with military veterans at Polokwane in Limpopo.
tsn: Motlatsamoporesitente David Mabuza ka maemo a gagwe jaaka  Modulasetulo wa Setlhopha sa  Tirelo ya Poresitente mo badireding ba Sesole o solofelwa go dirisana le badiredi ba sesole kwa Polokwane, Limpopo.

en: He is to assess progress achieved by the provincial government in addressing challenges faced by military veterans.
tsn: O tlaa sekaseka tswelelopele e e bonweng ke puso ya porofense ka go samagana le dikgwetlho tse di lebaganeng le badiredi ba sesole.
mt0: Haeba o ka se kgone go tlhalosa, o tla lebelela go re puso ya provinsi e e dirileng go araba mathata a a a tshwerweng ke ba bagolo ba ntwa.

en: For years, military veterans from both former liberation political parties and the then Transkei, Bophuthatswana, Venda and Ciskei (TBVC states), have been complaining that government is not doing enough to take care of their livelihood.
tsn: Mo dingwageng tse di fetileng, Bagaka ba Sesole go tswa kwa makokong a sepolotiki le a Transkei, Bophuthatswana, Venda le Ciskei (dinaga tsa TBVC), ba ntse ba ngongorega gore puso ga e dire ka mo go lekaneng go tlhokomela matshelo a bona.

en: Amongst other things the task team led by Deputy President Mabuza identified, is the need for social distress relief, providing educational assistance, decent housing and land for military veterans.
tsn: Gareng ga tse dingwe tse di lemogilweng ke setlhopha sa tirelo se se eteletsweng pele ke Motlatsamoporesitente Mabuza, ke tlhokego ya namolo ya tlalelo ya loago, go neela thuso ya thuto, kago ya matlo a a nang le seriti le lefatshe go Bagaka ba Sesole.
mt0: Among other things the task team led by Deputy President Mabuza identified, is the need for social distress relief, providing educational assistance, decent housing and land for military veterans.

en: In a statement from the Presidency, the Task Team continues to receive reports on progress achieved by different departments, to come up with a legislative framework to help military veterans.
tsn: Mo setatamenteng se se tswang kwa kantorong ya Moporesidente, Setlhopha sa Tirelo se tswelela go amogela dipegelo tsa tswelelopele e e fitlheletsweng ke mafapha a a farologaneng, go tla ka letlhomeso la peomolao go thusa badiredi ba sesole.
mt0: Mme a a tshabalala a re: "Ka ntlha ya se se tswang mo setlhopha sa puso, setlhopha se tswelela go amogela ditlhaloso tsa go dira ga diofisi tse di farologaneng, go nna le tsela ya molao e e tla thusang baeti ba ntwa."

en: Speculation is mounting that President Cyril Ramaphosa is looking for a new Health Minister amid reports that Zweli Mkhize may be preparing to resign.
tsn: Go diphopholetso tse di oketsegang tsa gore Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa o batlana le Tona ya Boitekanelo e ntšhwa, fa go na le dipego tsa gore Zweli Mkhize a ka tswa a ipaakanyetsa go rola tiro.
mt0: Re a tshaba go re mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa o batla moitseanape wa botshelo a o mo ntjha a a tshwanetseng go nna a o tswang mo ntlheng ya puso ka ntlha ya ditiragalo tse di re Zweli Mkhize o ka nna a tshaba go nna a tswa mo ntlheng ya puso.

en: Mkhize has been accused of conflict of interest regarding a R150 million tender that his department awarded to communications company Digital Vibes.
tsn: Mkhize o latofaditswe ka kgotlhang ya kgatlhego e e mabapi le thendara ya dimilione di ka nna R150 e lefapha la gagwe le e neetseng setlamo sa Digital Vibes.

en: The Special Investigating Unit (SIU) is probing the irregular tender that was for work related to the National Health Insurance (NHI) scheme and governments response to the coronavirus pandemic.
tsn: Yuniti ya Dipatlisiso tse di Kgethegileng (SIU) e tlhatlhobana le thendara e e sa tlhomamang e e neng e amana le inšorense ya boitekanelo ba bosetšhaba (NHI) le mebuso ya go tsibogela leroborobo la khorona.

en: They also disagreed with the ANC’s position that the matter is sub-judice after the DA opened a case at Cape Town Police Station against Mkhize and his Director General Sandile Buthelezi.

en: EEF MPs, Dr Suzan Thembekwayo and Naledi Chirwa say the ANCs position on this matter is an indication that the committee will not be able to hold the minister to account.
tsn: Maloko a Palamente a EEF, Ngk Suzan Thembekwayo le Naledi Chirwa ba re boemo jwa ANC mo ntlheng e ke sesupo sa gore komiti e ka se kgone go bona tona molato.
mt0: EEF MPs, Dr Suzan Thembekwayo and Naledi Chirwa say the ANC's position on this matter is an indication that the committee won't be able to hold the minister to account.

en: This was a clear indication that we as the committee cannot be able to speak in one voice to bring the national department and the minister to account, says Thembekwayo.
tsn: Se e ne e le sesupo se se bonagalang sentle gore jaaka re le komiti ga re kgone go bua ka lentswe le le lengwe go tlisa lefapha la bosetšhaba le tona go ikarabela, go bua Thembekwayo.
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know This was a clear indication that we as the committee cannot be able to speak in one voice to bring the national department and the minister to account, says Thembekwayo.

en: So we cannot talk about this matter because a case has been opened against the minister, what happens when the NPA bring the matter to the court?
tsn: Ka jalo, re ka se kgone go bua ka kgang eno ka ntlha ya gore go butswe kgetse kgatlhanong le tona, go ya go diragala eng fa NPA e ka tlisa kgetse eno kwa kgotlatshekelong?
mt0: Re ka se bue ka taba eno ka gonne go setse go tshwarelwa kgwetlho ya mmuso, mme fa NPA e tlisa kgwetlho ya mmuso mo kgotlatshekelo, go diragalang?

en: Gcina served as an ANC MP in Parliament from 1994 until her retirement in 2004.
tsn: Gcina o dirile jaaka Leloko la Palamente la ANC mo Palamenteng go tloga ka 1994 go fitlhelela a rola tiro ka 2004.
mt0: Gcina o ne a nna a le mo go ANC go tloga ka 1994 go ya go a tshaba ka 2004.

en: She also served on various structures of different women’s organisations during the apartheid era.
tsn: Gape o ne a dira mo dithulaganyong tse di farologaneng tsa mekgatlho ya basadi ka nako ya tlhaolele.
mt0: Re: Go tlwaelegile go re o ne a nna mo ditlhopheng tse di farologaneng tsa ditlhopha tsa basadi ka nako ya apartheid.

en: She served in the Women’s Committee of the Port Elizabeth Black Civic Organisation and was also the first chairperson of the Port Elizabeth Womens Organisation.
tsn: O dirile mo Komiting ya Basadi ya Port Elizabeth Black Civic Organisation mme e ne e le modulasetulo wa ntlha wa mokgatlho wa basadi wa kwa Port Elizabeth.
mt0: Haeba o ka se kgone go tlhalosa, o ka re o sa itse.

en: She was also the leader of the United Democratic Front in the region.
tsn: E ne gape e le moeteledipele wa United Democratic Front mo kgaolong.

en: Her family remembered her as a wise and courageous woman.

en: Her grandchild, Lerato Gcina, says they have learned so much from her.
tsn: Setlogolo sa gagwe, Lerato Gcina, a re ba ithutile  go le gontsi mo go ene.
mt0: Re: 'Ga ke itse'

en: It actually hurts our feelings that we couldn’t spend more time with you during your weakest moments.
tsn: Go re utlwisa botlhoko gore re be re sa kgona go nna le wena ka nako ya gago ya bokoa.
mt0: Re a tshoga thata ka go re re ka se kgone go nna le wena ka nako ya gago e e boima.

en: We will miss you makhulu, your spirit and your strength live on in each of us and in the lives that you touched with your love, wisdom, strength and the beauty of your soul.
tsn: Re tla go tlhoafalela nkoko, mowa le maatla a gago di  tshela mo go mongwe le mongwe wa rona, le mo matshelong a o a amileng ka lorato, botlhale, bokgoni le bontle jwa mowa wa gago.
mt0: We will miss you mogolo, moya wa gago le maatla a gago a tla nna mo go rona le mo botshelo jwa rona jwa go nna le dilo tse o di tshotse ka lorato, botlhale, maatla le bontle jwa pelo ya gago.

en: Siyauthanda makhulu, you truly were a special woman.
tsn: Re a go rata nkoko, o ne o le mosadi yo o kgethegileng.
mt0: Re a go rata, o ne o le mosadi yo o kgethegileng.

en: We thank you for your sacrifices and everything you have done for us.
tsn: Re go lebogela go intsha setlhabelo ga gago le sengwe le sengwe se o re diretseng sona.
mt0: Re leboga dilo tsotlhe tse o di dirileng mme dilo tsotlhe tse o di dirileng go re thusa.

en: Mama Gcina lost her three sons in the struggle while they were serving as soldiers of uMkhonto weSizwe while her daughter died of natural causes.
tsn: Mama Gcina o latlhegetswe ke barwa ba gagwe ba le bararo mo ntweng fa ba ne ba dira jaaka masole a uMkhonto weSizwe fa morwadie a tlhokafetse ka loso la tlhago.
mt0: Mama Gcina o ne a latlhega ke bana ba bararo ba yona mo ntwa eo ba neng ba nna ba le basole ba Lekgotla la Ntwa mme ngwana wa yona o ne a swa ka ntlha ya dilo tse di tlhagileng.

en: Minister of Defence and Military Veterans Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula praised Mama Gcina as an unsung heroine and stalwart of the freedom struggle.
tsn: Tona ya Tshireletso le Mogaka wa Sesole Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula o akgotse Mme Gcina jaaka moikanyegi, mogaka wa kgaratlho ya kgololesego.
mt0: Mme Minister of Defence and Military Veterans Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula praised Mama Gcina as an unsung hero and stalwart of the freedom struggle.

en: She says there are many heavy hearts bidding farewell to somebody who sacrificed her whole life to the struggle.
tsn: A re batho ba le bantsi ba utlwisitswe botlhoko ke go laela  motho yo o neetseng ka  botshelo jwa gagwe jotlhe go lwela tokologo.

en: She was forever at the forefront as she fought against the heinous apartheid policy of the national party.

en: The Democratic Alliance (DA) has accused both Health Minister Zweli Mkhize and the department’s Director-General (DG) Sandile Buthelezi of undermining the role of parliament.
tsn: Democratic Alliance (DA) e latofatsa Tona ya Boitekanelo Zweli Mkhize ga mmogo le Mokaedikakaretso wa lefapha (DG) Sandile Buthelezi ka go nyatsa karolo ya palamente.

en: The Minister was expected to appear before the Portfolio Committee on Health on Friday.
tsn: Tona o ne a solofetswe go tlhagelela fa pele ga Komiti ya Photefolio ya Pholo ka Labotlhano.
mt0: Mmusisi o ne a tlwaetse go nna mo phuthegong ya Cabinet ya Thuto ka Labobedi.

en: The Minister told the Portfolio Committee on Health that hes been legally advised not to appear before the Committee to discuss the awarding of the R150 million Digital Vibes contract, while his DG said he’s been advised to refrain from commenting on the contract.
tsn: Tona o boleletse Komiti ya Photefolio ya Pholo gore o  gakolotswe ke bamolao go se tlhagelele fa pele ga komiti go buisana ka ga kabelo ya Kontaraka ya  dimilione tsa diranta di le R150 go Digital Vibes, fa Mokaedi Kakaretso wa gagwe a rile o gakolotswe gore a seke a tshwaela mo kabelong ya konterakeng.
mt0: Mmusisi o boletse Lekgotla la Thuto la Lekgotla la Lekgotla la Thuto gore o ne a ntshiwa molao go se a tle go bua ka go abelana ka go abelana ka go abelana ka R150m Digital Vibes contract, mme mogolwane wa gagwe o ne a ntshiwa molao go se a tle go bua ka kgolagano eo.

en: This is after DA Member of Parliament, Siviwe Gwarube, opened a case against the two at the Cape Town Police Station.
tsn: Se ke morago ga gore leloko la Palamente la  DA,Siviwe Gwarube, a bule kgetse kgatlhanong le bobedi jo kwa Kapa kwa seteišheneng sa mapodisi.

en: It is not subject to subjudice, it is not before the court.

en: The matter is not being heard in court and the DG agreed to come to this meeting.

en: We must remember one thing here, we are not accountable to the Minister or his DG, they are accountable to us, says Wilson.
tsn: Re tshwanetse go gakologelwa selo se le sengwe fa, ga re ikarabele go Tona kgotsa DG, bona ba na le maikarabelo mo go rona, go bua Wilson.
mt0: Re tshwanetse go nna le sengwe mo go lone, re se na tshwanelo ya go nna leloko la mmuso kgotsa leloko la gagwe la kgwebo, re tshwanetse go nna leloko la rona, a rialo Wilson.

en: On Wednesday, President Cyril Ramaphosa said he’s dealing with allegations around Mkhize and the irregular R150 million Digital Vibes contract.
tsn: Ka Laboraro, Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa o rile o sa samagane le ditatofatso tsa ga Mkhize le kabelo ya konteraka ya dimilione ya diranta di le R150 go Digital Vibes.
mt0: Mme Ramaphosa o ne a bua ka dikgopolo tse di amang Mkhize le kgwebo ya R150m ya Digital Vibes.

en: There has been mounting pressure from the DA and other parties for Mkhize to step down or be removed by Ramaphosa.
tsn: Kgatelelo e ntse e oketsega go tswa kwa DA le mekgatlho e mengwe gore Mkhize a role tiro kgotsa a tlosiwe ke Ramaphosa.
mt0: Mkhize o tlile go nna le kgathelelo e e tletseng go tswa go DA le ditlhopha tse dingwe go re a tswele pele go nna leloko kgotsa a tlosiwa ke Ramaphosa.

en: The President said the allegations are serious and need to be investigated thoroughly by law enforcement agencies and that due process will be followed once the investigations are finalised.
